metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3963 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ownCloud Server before 6.0.1 does not properly check permissions, which allows remote authenticated users to access arbitrary preview pictures via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3963` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
